name: Top Bar
author: umarbajwa

sections.description:
Top bar plugin offers simple and user friendly user interface. Customizable bar with important features which most of the bar plugins do not offer.
Responsive , zero coding skills required, fulfill your needs. MailChimp forms supported and integrated, can save subscribers data in database.

You can add any type of content Ads,Images,HTML,Embed Videos or embed contact forms of any WordPress form plugin with simple short-code and collect leads or let people contact you. This plugin will offer end-less possibilities.

MailChimp subscribe form let your visitors subscribe securely and you can easily access your subscribers emails.

Database Subscriber form let your visitors subscribe and lets you download the email as .csv file so that you can add it to any email marketing service without a single trouble.

Features :

  • Provides easy and simple user interface.

  • Shortcode Content Supported.

  • Responsive/Fluid .

  • Add custom html,styling, buttons and much more.

  • Design your own bar according to your theme.

  • Allow you to make your custom bar.

  • Most important features included.

  • Simple and Elegant design

  • Shortcode supported (Premium version Only)

  • Can be used as subscribe form (Premium version Only)

  • You can embed videos pictures documents and alot more .(Premium version Only)

  • MailChimp Subscribe form supported (Premium version Only)

  • Email Subscribe field (Premium version Only)

  • You can display ads

The best way to Increase your sales or conversions Get Premium Version Now

Note : This plugin includes a watermark and link to the pluign page.
sections.installation: • Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.
sections.changelog:
2.4

  • Better Design
  • Improved UI
  • Support and dashboard links added to plugins page
  • Minor Bug Fixes

3.0

  • Fixed design issues.
  • Bug Fixes.
  • Logo added.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  • Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.

short_description: Top Bar plugin is very helpful for attracting users attention and gaining more subscribers Easy and simple to use, Clean and simple design.
